aesthetic.title: Aesthetic Clinic
aesthetic.subtitle: From WhatsApp overload to optimized scheduling

situation.title: Usual Situation
situation.description: Multiple budget inquiries via WhatsApp, patients asking about availability at all hours, and the team spending 2-3 hours daily just responding to messages and managing the schedule.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Messages pile up during treatments, budget inquiries go unanswered until end of day, and many potential patients end up contacting other clinics that respond faster.

action.title: System Action
action.description: Automatically responds to treatment and budget inquiries, manages real-time availability, sends appointment confirmations and reminders, and only escalates cases requiring personalized attention.

change.title: What Changes
change.description: Team focuses on treatments without interruptions, patients receive immediate 24/7 responses, schedule is automatically optimized, and more appointments are captured without increasing workload.

dental.title: Dental Clinic
dental.subtitle: From losing urgent appointments to immediate care

situation.title: Usual Situation
situation.description: Patients with emergencies calling after hours, appointment confirmations by phone interrupting treatments, and last-minute no-shows leaving gaps in the schedule.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Night and weekend emergencies are lost until Monday, confirmation calls consume team time, and cancellation gaps don't get filled in time.

action.title: System Action
action.description: Manages 24/7 emergencies prioritizing by severity, sends automatic confirmations and detects cancellations, offers available slots when cancellations occur, and keeps team informed only when necessary.

change.title: What Changes
change.description: Real emergencies are captured immediately, schedule stays full by optimizing gaps, team spends zero time on routine confirmations, and patients feel someone is always available.

physiotherapy.title: Physiotherapy Center
physiotherapy.subtitle: From manual management to automatic follow-up

situation.title: Usual Situation
situation.description: Patients in multi-session treatments, manual evolution tracking, forgotten next appointment reminders, and difficulty maintaining treatment continuity.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Patients abandon treatment mid-way because they forget to schedule next session, manual follow-up consumes time, and it's hard to know which patients need personalized reminders.

action.title: System Action
action.description: Sends automatic next session reminders, detects patients who haven't scheduled their continuation, keeps treatment history accessible, and suggests optimal times based on patient patterns.

change.title: What Changes
change.description: Treatment continuity improves significantly, patients feel accompanied in their recovery, team has complete visibility without extra effort, and schedule remains stable and predictable.
